name: Bumper Boats
description:
Bumper Boats

It's a battle in the bathtub! Bump your opponents and bounce them into obstacles to sink them!

Instructions

2-4 Players. Press Q, V, K or left arrow key to join. Press the Spacebar to begin. Use the keys Q and W, V and B, K and L or Left arrow and Right arrow  keys to steer your boat left or right. Press the ESC key to exit the game.

Currently only compatible for Windows.

This game was made for the Women Game Jam 2021 by

Aubrey Gregory

Emma Wilson

Lauren Fletcher

Sasha Rosteck
